txt.en:
'You wish to learn the ways of the Burglar, do you?

'It is prudent to study your foe's weaknesses and weigh your own tactics before engaging them. For instance, approaching a foe from Stealth increases the potency of many of your attacks. After all, a moment's forethought could be the difference between victory and defeat!

'Prove your mettle to me, and I shall deem you a worthy Burglar. Although it is not the most wily opponent, I would ask that you approach one of the training dummies nearby and strike it with a <rgb=#00ff00>Surprise Strike</rgb>. If your form is improper, it is better that you hone it against a foe that cannot strike back!'

HINT:

Burglars benefit greatly from <rgb=#ffff00>Critical Strikes</rgb> and <rgb=#ffff00>Devastating Blows</rgb>. Scoring such hits will allow them to use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Double-edged Strike</rgb>. In addition, many Burglar skills benefit from being in <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb>.

Try attacking a <rgb=#ff0000>training dummy</rgb> from <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb> with <rgb=#ffff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> to inflict even more damage.

'Well done, [placeholder]! As you continue to hone your skill, I have no doubt you will learn even more surprising techniques to tip the scales of battle in your favour.\n\n'Now then, I believe you should return to Elladan.'

'You should strike the training dummy with the most Cunning Attack you can muster. Once you feel confident in your ability, return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to properly wield a blade!'

<rgb=#00ff00>HINT:

Burglars benefit greatly from <rgb=#ffff00>Critical Strikes</rgb> and <rgb=#ffff00>Devastating Blows</rgb>. Scoring such hits will allow them to use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Double-edged Strike</rgb>. In addition, many Burglar skills benefit from being in <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb>.

Try attacking a <rgb=#ff0000>training dummy</rgb> from <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb> with <rgb=#ffff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> to inflict even more damage. </rgb>
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.
You have struck the training dummy with Surprise Strike
Strike the training dummy with <rgb=#00ff00>Surprise Strike</rgb>

Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> skill against the nearby training dummy.

HINT: Burglars benefit greatly from <rgb=#ffff00>Critical Strikes</rgb> and <rgb=#ffff00>Devastating Blows</rgb>. Scoring such hits will allow them to use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Double-edged Strike</rgb>. In addition, many Burglar skills benefit from being in <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb>.

Try attacking a <rgb=#ff0000>training dummy</rgb> from <rgb=#ffff00>Stealth</rgb> with <rgb=#ffff00>Surprise Strike</rgb> to inflict even more damage.
Talk to the Burglar Trainer at the Edhelion Watch
The Burglar Trainer is at the Edhelion Watch.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your Surprise Strike, you should return to your trainer and tell them of your success.
